item.title: Regular Meetings
item.description: The regular meetings of the Corporation shall be held quarterly at a time and place designated by the chair.

item.title: Annual Meetings
item.description: The regular meeting during the final quarter of the administrative year shall be known as the annual meeting and shall be for the purposes of electing officers; receiving reports of officers and committees; and any other business that may arise.

item.title: Special Meetings
item.description: A special meeting may be called by the chair or by a written request of three members of the Board of Directors. The purpose of the meeting shall be stated in the call, which shall be communicated to all members at least 48 hours before the meeting.

item.title: Administrative Year
item.description: The administrative year of the Corporation shall run concurrently with the administrative year of the Local Church.

item.title: Notice of Meetings
item.description: Official notice of each regular meeting shall be given to each member by email not less than fifteen days prior to the meeting.

item.title: Quorum
item.description: Three voting members of the Board of Directors shall constitute a quorum.
